channel.title: Stripping Client/Server Please Help!
channel.description:
Alright, i'm creating a modified version of runescape. it's going to be VERY modified where you can barely tell it's runescape.
Alright, first. How to do i remove to XP stuff? Such as Attack XP, Magic XP, Construction XP, and stuff like that. To where it's just a blank box with nothing at all inside of it?
I've looked everyone in the client, and in the server. going through file by file searching. I can NOT find it. anyone who can help, that would be awesome.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 27, 2009, 12:48:33 pm[/size][hr]bumpbump, i still have this problem!

item.title: Stripping Client/Server Please Help!
